settings.title: {{ collection.title }}
settings.text: Your sneakers are sacred to you, always nice and clean and well maintained? To keep it that way, we have the best care products for sneakers!

If Jason Markk or Collonil, here you will find sponges, brushes and the right cleaning products to get your treasures clean again. For the wet days we also have impregnation for you, so that your sneakers are perfectly protected.

Here you will find helpful videos and application examples for the sneaker care products fromÂ Jason Markk.

______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

The Jason Markk Premium Brush is made from a handcrafted walnut wood handle and is made of soft hog's hair excellent for DELICATE materials like suede, mesh, cotton canvas and more. Some materials just need some extra lovin.

  • Softer hog bristle
  • Handcrafted walnut wood handle
  • Heat-stamped Jason Markk logo on the handle
  • Ideal on delicate materials such as premium leather, suede or cotton mesh

settings.button_label: Buy the Premium Shoe Cleaning Brush

settings.text:
Note: When cleaning premium leather, suede, cotton mesh and other delicate materials, take extra care and be gentle. We highly recommend using our Premium Shoe Cleaning Brush. The softer hog bristles are better suited for use on delicate surfaces.

______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

• 5.4 oz.
  • Excellent durability
  • Will not alter the look or feel of the material
  • Odorless & colorless
  • Water-based, propellent free
  • Reusable applicator. Refills available.

Jason Markk Repel creates a durable, breathable barrier that effectively repels liquids and stains. It's water-based formula is safe to use on all materials like suede, nubuck, leather, nylon, canvas and more. We've totally redesigned Jason Mark Repel to deliver a "better-than-aerosol" spray quality. Engineered with multi-patented technologies, a fine mist combined with a continuous spray functionality covers large areas quickly and evenly in all directions.

______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

• 30 wipes per box
  • Made from naturally-derived ingredients
  • Unique and durable dual-textured material
  • Superior cleaning ability
  • Convenient dispenser box

    Note: This product is not to be used directly on suede and/or nubuck.

The original dual-textured cleaning wipe, but bigger and better! We've taken our iconic Quick Wipe and optimized on formula and function to deliver an, even more, superior clean on the go. Now 30% larger in size with a 50% height increase of the raised dots, our Quick Wipes provide all the cleaning power you need to stay fresh daily.
